resources.string: Welcome to the app with magic feature
Are you willing to trade personal data for a magic feature?
You can now use the magic feature!
Write 3 word that describe you best (use , as a separator)
Where are you located?\nLong press and Add pin to the map
Yeah, I don\'t feel like saving
Listen, if you keep this question asking rate up, the world is going to run out of electricity.\n\nCome back again in:

 In order to access certain features of the app, you may be required to register an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and to update such information to keep it accurate and complete. You are responsible for safeguarding your password and other login credentials.

 All content, trademarks, service marks, trade names, logos, and icons are the property of the company or its licensors and are protected by applicable copyright and trademark laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without explicit permission.

 You agree not to engage in any of the following:

 We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the service at any time, with or without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is otherwise harmful to other users, us, or third parties.

 To the fullest extent permitted by law, the company shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of the service.


8. Indemnification

10. Contact Us
